REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0465 reute b f BC-U.K.-MONEY-MARKET-REC 04-03 0064

TEXT.TITLE: U.K. MONEY MARKET RECEIVES 170 MLN STG HELP
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it has operated in the money market this morning, purchasing 170 mln stg bank bills. This compares with the Bank's revised estimate of a 750 mln stg shortfall. In band two the Bank bought 72 mln stg at 9-13/16 pct, in band three 52 mln at 9-3/4 pct and in band four 46 mln at 9-11/16 pct. REUTER
